FormantaSass
the individualist Sass Framework

FormantaSass: Core

Feature demonstration, This page is intended to demonstrate what elements will be styled by FormantaSass.

Typography

A very fine grained setting of all the font things is the first, every headline, every other thing could be like you need it!

Normal paragraphs should be gray? Links should be green? H1 should be black, h2 pink and h3 blue and underlined? No problem, everything possible.

And a paragraph with a link to a great homepage, worth visting.

Grid

In Flood the grid exists of a few parts: the breakpoints define when what will happeen, a .for-container holds the content section (we are already in one) and centers it. In there could be .for-row, these contain the .for-col-* which seperate the contents. Gutters are already applied to .for-col-* a responsive way.

Example Basic, no gutter

Example Basic, responsive gutter

Example Basic, thinnest to thickest of fixed gutter

Example Alignment
